quote: Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. It's the only way to become what you were meant to be.
Holding on to toxic relationships is what keeps us from growing.
I am your friend. And there are many others like me who would prefer you not perish.
You’re off to great places, today is your day. Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.
No one is perfect - that’s why pencils have erasers.
A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
Kill them with success and bury them with a smile.
Life was a willow and it bent right to your wind.
